EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, 380 PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
IN 32-55N 012-20E AT 080120Z MAR. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
